title: Concerned ranked player.
body: Why are people playing Tank Ekko, in the mid lane of all places, immediately after it gets nerfed? Like I'm fine with tank ekko but why in a place where damage actually matters and where we already have enough tanks?

replies.body: Similar to the way I play Malzahar top often when I'm given top instead of mid, players often play champions they're comfortable with and with builds they regularly and consistently use. I would say it's out of habit more than anything, as well as tank Ekko still having a decent amount of damage (albeit not as much burst as many other mages) and survivability.
Probably seeing how viable it still is,  a ranked enviroment is a very different enviroment to a normal game after all.
